ballista (building.label) A giant crossbow-like siege weapon that fires large bolts at distant targets. This particular ballista has been designed and built to be easily operated by Ratkins.
ballista The giant crossbow-like bolt launcher from a ballista. Accurate and long-ranged. ballista
ballista bolt (standard) A regular ballista bolt, resembling an oversized arrow. Most targets are unlikely to survive a direct hit by one of these projectiles ballista bolt (standard)
ballista bolt (heavy) A reinforced version of the standard ballista bolt. The increased projectile mass combined with an enlarged bolt head allows it to inflict greater damage upon impact with its target. ballista bolt (heavy)
ballista bolt (AP) A version of the standard ballista bolt that has been fitted with an narrow arrowhead quench-hardened in oil, allowing it to penetrate multiple targets in its trajectory. ballista bolt (AP)
